Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui

Class GUIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.GUIView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View, VirtualView, java.rmi.Remote
    public class GUIView
extends javafx.application.Application
implements View, VirtualView
    main class for the gui .this class implements the method for changing the scene and for interacting with the preloader.

      • userInput

        public javax.json.JsonObject userInput()
        this method creates a bridge between the user and the gui , the gui takes user's input and puts it into a queue where a thread is waiting to take information and send it to the server

        userInput in interface View
        Returns:
